An American undercover FBI agent is assigned to infiltrate a terrorist sleeper cell that is planning an attack in Los Angeles." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0465353/","name":"Sleeper Cell","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUyNzE5NzkyNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjU5MzMzMQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"An American undercover FBI agent is assigned to infiltrate a terrorist sleeper cell that is planning an attack in Los Angeles.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0465353/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"irishbray","dateCreated":"2005-12-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Fantastic........and Frightening","reviewBody":"I read the first comment with interest and confusion. I find this series to be incredibly good. So much so that it is difficult to watch because of the feelings, mostly of fear, that it generates. Michael Ealy, as Darwyn, is performing fabulously. You can see and feel the conflict and stress his character faces as an undercover agent with the sole responsibility to uncover and prevent a major terrorist event.

And Oden Fehr as the cell leader is downright frightening. He's extremely good looking, charming and very easily fits into 'Anywhere' America. His cold blooded anything for the cause attitude is so scary.

What's the most frightening is that this cell isn't comprised of 'obvious' enemies. Probably very much like real life. We can only hope there are really a few Darwyn's out there as well.

I'm hooked!","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":6167,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Crime","Drama","Thriller"],"keywords":"fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation,terrorist,die hard scenario,multilingual","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1013003/","name":"Michael Ealy","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004912/","name":"Oded Fehr","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0523825/","name":"Henri Lubatti"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0173346/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0717550/","name":"Ethan Reiff","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0903456/","name":"Cyrus Voris"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Sleeper Cell","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi598981913","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2QxNjdhM2UtMzQ3OC00Mjc2LTg2NGEtMWRmZjI2NmNlN2JjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2QxNjdhM2UtMzQ3OC00Mjc2LTg2NGEtMWRmZjI2NmNlN2JjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Sleeper Cell"</script><metacontent="

An Atlantic City politician plays both sides of the law by conspiring with gangsters during the Prohibition era." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0979432/","name":"Boardwalk Empire","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTYxNzc5ZmYtODcyNi00ZWUwLWExNWUtY2Y0YTlhZDBlMGU1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzQ1ODk3MTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"An Atlantic City politician plays both sides of the law by conspiring with gangsters during the Prohibition era.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0979432/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"851222"},"dateCreated":"2010-09-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"Simply ... WOW!","reviewBody":"Greetings from Lithuania.

What a wonderful pilot!

First i read some reviews before watching pilot, and they where saying how "boooring" this episode was. Hell no! That was one of the best pilots in a ... ever! When you have screenwriter of "Sopranos" and Mr. M.Scorsese in a director chair - nothing can go wrong! A pilot of "Boardwalk Empire" reminded my of "Goodfellas", "Sopranos" (i read that behind this show is a writer of "Sopranos" after watching pilot) and ... "Departed" - it's was THAT good.

If this show will live up to the pilot - we have a new Emmy winner in all possible categories.

Watch it and don't wary about negative reviews - this is a really great show.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":179358,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.5},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Crime","Drama","History"],"datePublished":"2010-09-19","keywords":"prohibition,gangster,murder,atlantic city new jersey,1920s","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000114/","name":"Steve Buscemi"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0531808/","name":"Kelly Macdonald"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0788335/","name":"Michael Shannon"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0092329/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0198598/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1010540/","name":"Terence Winter"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"What Jesus Said","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3198988057","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTc1NzUxODA1OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODE0NDAzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTc1NzUxODA1OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODE0NDAzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch a scene from an episode of "Boardwalk Empire"."}}</script><metacontent="

An Atlantic City politician plays both sides of the law by conspiring with gangsters during the Prohibition era." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0979432/","name":"Boardwalk Empire","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTYxNzc5ZmYtODcyNi00ZWUwLWExNWUtY2Y0YTlhZDBlMGU1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzQ1ODk3MTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"An Atlantic City politician plays both sides of the law by conspiring with gangsters during the Prohibition era.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0979432/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"851222","dateCreated":"2010-09-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"Simply ... WOW!","reviewBody":"Greetings from Lithuania.

What a wonderful pilot!

First i read some reviews before watching pilot, and they where saying how "boooring" this episode was. Hell no! That was one of the best pilots in a ... ever! When you have screenwriter of "Sopranos" and Mr. M.Scorsese in a director chair - nothing can go wrong! A pilot of "Boardwalk Empire" reminded my of "Goodfellas", "Sopranos" (i read that behind this show is a writer of "Sopranos" after watching pilot) and ... "Departed" - it's was THAT good.

If this show will live up to the pilot - we have a new Emmy winner in all possible categories.

What a wonderful pilot!

First i read some reviews before watching pilot, and they where saying how "boooring" this episode was. Hell no! That was one of the best pilots in a ... ever! When you have screenwriter of "Sopranos" and Mr. M.Scorsese in a director chair - nothing can go wrong! A pilot of "Boardwalk Empire" reminded my of "Goodfellas", "Sopranos" (i read that behind this show is a writer of "Sopranos" after watching pilot) and ... "Departed" - it's was THAT good.

If this show will live up to the pilot - we have a new Emmy winner in all possible categories.

An Atlantic City politician plays both sides of the law by conspiring with gangsters during the Prohibition era." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0979432/","name":"Boardwalk Empire","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTYxNzc5ZmYtODcyNi00ZWUwLWExNWUtY2Y0YTlhZDBlMGU1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzQ1ODk3MTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"An Atlantic City politician plays both sides of the law by conspiring with gangsters during the Prohibition era.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0979432/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"851222","dateCreated":"2010-09-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"Simply ... WOW!","reviewBody":"Greetings from Lithuania.

What a wonderful pilot!

First i read some reviews before watching pilot, and they where saying how "boooring" this episode was. Hell no! That was one of the best pilots in a ... ever! When you have screenwriter of "Sopranos" and Mr. M.Scorsese in a director chair - nothing can go wrong! A pilot of "Boardwalk Empire" reminded my of "Goodfellas", "Sopranos" (i read that behind this show is a writer of "Sopranos" after watching pilot) and ... "Departed" - it's was THAT good.

If this show will live up to the pilot - we have a new Emmy winner in all possible categories.

Watch it and don't wary about negative reviews - this is a really great show.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":179358,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.5,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Crime","Drama","History"],"datePublished":"2010-09-19","keywords":"prohibition,gangster,murder,atlantic city new jersey,1920s","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000114/","name":"Steve Buscemi","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0531808/","name":"Kelly Macdonald","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0788335/","name":"Michael Shannon"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0092329/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0198598/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1010540/","name":"Terence Winter"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"What Jesus Said","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3198988057","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTc1NzUxODA1OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODE0NDAzMzE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTc1NzUxODA1OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODE0NDAzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch a scene from an episode of "Boardwalk Empire"."</script><metacontent="

7 Days in Hell
programme.desc: 7 Days in Hell: Directed by Jake Szymanski. With Andy Samberg, Kit Harington, Fred Armisen, David Copperfield. A fictional documentary-style expose on the rivalry between two of the greatest tennis players of all-time who battled it out in a 2001 match that lasted seven days." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3895884/","name":"7 Days in Hell","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU2NTE0NzM5OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDYwMDc1NjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A fictional documentary-style expose on the rivalry between two of the greatest tennis players of all-time who battled it out in a 2001 match that lasted seven days.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3895884/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"gianlucamarzano16"},"dateCreated":"2015-07-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"A long Saturday night live sketch","reviewBody":"7 days in hell is a fictional documentary about the longest tennis match in history. It is directed by Jake Szymanski and stars Kit Harington and Andy Samberg. First off, seeing the trailer I could this could be very funny or just very stupid. I'm glad to said that it turned out to be very funny. The acting is great, Kit Harington who is on Game Of Thrones, I didn't know if he could be funny and he played his part perfect. Andy Samberg was also great. He always plays a funny part and he's does a great job most of the time. Overall 7 days in hell was a funny fake documentary about tennis with great acting and has lots of great cameos. Defiantly worth checking out.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":17826,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Comedy","Sport"],"datePublished":"2015-07-11","keywords":"tennis player,tennis,male pubic hair,pubic hair,streaker","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"7 Days in Hell: "Eternal Flames" Teaser","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi742240281","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI2MTI2ODgzNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTc5NzA5NTE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI2MTI2ODgzNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTc5NzA5NTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"First teaser for HBO's fictional documentary, 7 Days in Hell."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1676221/","name":"Andy Samberg"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3229685/","name":"Kit Harington"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0035488/","name":"Fred Armisen"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2021516/","name":"Jake Szymanski"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0563019/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1104505/","name":"Murray Miller"}],"duration":"PT43M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Die Hard 2
Stirb langsam 2
programme.desc:
Die Hard 2: Directed by Renny Harlin. With Bruce Willis, Bonnie Bedelia, William Atherton, Reginald VelJohnson. John McClane attempts to avert disaster as rogue military operatives seize control of Dulles International Airport in Washington, D.C." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0099423/","name":"Die Hard 2","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzMzYzk3ZTEtZDg0My00MTY5LWE3ZmQtYzNhYjhjN2RhZGRjL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTAyODkwOQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"John McClane attempts to avert disaster as rogue military operatives seize control of Dulles International Airport in Washington, D.C.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0099423/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ivo-cobra8"},"dateCreated":"2015-10-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Die Hard 2 is my all time personal favorite Action film an underrated","reviewBody":"Die Hard 2 in my opinion is my third favorite decent action flick in a "Die Hard" series and a good movie to watch. It is one of my personal favorite action movies. It is one of the most underrated "Die Hard" films in the series and that not a bad one. His wife again a hostage, Christmas again, the same reporter from the 1st film, now a janitor Marvin is a helper instead of Argyle and so on. As far as sequels go, Die Hard 2 is excellent. Of course it isn't better than the first, but sequels rarely are. This film is like going to a circus: you sit back and watch crazy stuff happen, laugh, cheer, joke, and just have a good time. Bruce Willis gives a great performance in the lead, we have some solid villains, and some brilliant action set pieces. I say check it out. 

I'm not one to subtract points for a lack of realism, or "real world believability" in films. Because of that, Die Hard 2 poses a very interesting case study for me. Real world believability is very difficult to not think about when watching this film. Why wouldn't the planes just reroute to other nearby airports? There are a bunch less than an hour's flight away, including Baltimore, Philadelphia, the three New York City-area airports, and so on. Why wouldn't they be able to call another close airport, or the Pentagon, or somewhere else nearby to have them contact the planes? They're near Washington, D.C., after all (don't forget that Dulles is 26 miles away from D.C., in Virginia, making it unlikely that planes out of fuel would begin "dropping on the White House lawn"). It seems like maybe this film should have been set somewhere like Salt Lake City, Utah instead. Why wouldn't they be able to show the runways through some other means, like a line of emergency or police vehicles with their sirens on? If the "terrorists" started shooting at the vehicles, or trying to blow them up, at least they'd be given an indication where the fire is coming from/given their location. Just how likely would it be that there's a big storm in the area on the day when General Ramon Esperanza (Franco Nero) is being extradited? How likely is it that he'd be extradited on Christmas Eve? Why the hell is John standing out on the runway in the snow waving a couple of flaming poles--just what does he think that will do? 

Die Hard 2 is still awesome movie and sequel to the first one for me and I don't know why people are saying it is the worst one or why they hate it. I don't, I love it, more than the first one I love it. In 2005 was my first best action movie than the first one. What I love about this film is they show John McClain more as a human being. In the beginning at the airport when his car was taken away at the airport, the whole movie show's an actual terror the villains are more of a threat cause they're actual terrorists! The Action sequences are awesome, there is barely any Cgi in it, John McClane is again in another elevator shafts. I love the plot twist that was wonderful, the snow in the film, the mobile snow chase whit McClane was awesome. This film is not perfect It is good, it has some problems in it. Always enjoyed watching it. The problems for the airport I already mentioned, the most annoying to me was after McClane kills the henchman when he was saving Leslie Barnes he pushed a terrorist of the latter and that latter tower falls on a terrorist you can see that it is a dummy from close that should not been seen from close camera.

It is still It is one of my personal favorite action movies mostly in the winter when it is snowing. The first movie was hug success, Renny Harlin's job by making this movie make it even harder for him, to find a good story, and make a snow because they didn't had any actual snow at the time it was really hard. 

I love it. The facts I love: Chase with the Snowmobile, shooting with blanks on Carmine Lorenzo, fights on an airplane, double cross, John's jokes... The General Esperanza on airplane from Val Verde the same country was named in Schwarzenegger's movie Commando, John's shooting with snowmobile, than John's fight by the church. Movie to me is really awesome. I enjoy watching Die Hard 2. 10/10 Grade: Bad-Ass Seal Of Approval It is my second favorite Die Hard film in the series.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":348439,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Thriller"],"datePublished":"1990-07-03","keywords":"john mcclane character,opening action scene,bravery,radar,detective","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Die Hard 2: Die Harder","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2417468441","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmE2MTI4Y2QtNjA0OC00ZTFiLWFjNjUtNzM0YzgwM2VlNDAzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmE2MTI4Y2QtNjA0OC00ZTFiLWFjNjUtNzM0YzgwM2VlNDAzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer 2 for Die Hard: Die Harder"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000246/","name":"Bruce Willis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0040472/","name":"William Atherton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000889/","name":"Bonnie Bedelia"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001317/","name":"Renny Harlin"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0119038/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019968/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0211823/","name":"Steven E. de Souza"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0724514/","name":"Doug Richardson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0905709/","name":"Walter Wager"}],"duration":"PT2H4M"}</script><metacontent="

credits.actor: Bruce Willis, Bonnie Bedelia, William Atherton, Reginald Veljohnson, Franco Nero

They're near Washington, D.C., after all (don't forget that Dulles is 26 miles away from D.C., in Virginia, making it unlikely that planes out of fuel would begin "dropping on the White House lawn"). It seems like maybe this film should have been set somewhere like Salt Lake City, Utah instead. Why wouldn't they be able to show the runways through some other means, like a line of emergency or police vehicles with their sirens on? If the "terrorists" started shooting at the vehicles, or trying to blow them up, at least they'd be given an indication where the fire is coming from/given their location. Just how likely would it be that there's a big storm in the area on the day when General Ramon Esperanza (Franco Nero) is being extradited? How likely is it that he'd be extradited on Christmas Eve? Why the hell is John standing out on the runway in the snow waving a couple of flaming poles--just what does he think that will do? 

Die Hard 2 is still awesome movie and sequel to the first one for me and I don't know why people are saying it is the worst one or why they hate it. I don't, I love it, more than the first one I love it. In 2005 was my first best action movie than the first one. What I love about this film is they show John McClain more as a human being. In the beginning at the airport when his car was taken away at the airport, the whole movie show's an actual terror the villains are more of a threat cause they're actual terrorists! The Action sequences are awesome, there is barely any Cgi in it, John McClane is again in another elevator shafts. I love the plot twist that was wonderful, the snow in the film, the mobile snow chase whit McClane was awesome. This film is not perfect It is good, it has some problems in it. Always enjoyed watching it. The problems for the airport I already mentioned, the most annoying to me was after McClane kills the henchman when he was saving Leslie Barnes he pushed a terrorist of the latter and that latter tower falls on a terrorist you can see that it is a dummy from close that should not been seen from close camera.

It is still It is one of my personal favorite action movies mostly in the winter when it is snowing. The first movie was hug success, Renny Harlin's job by making this movie make it even harder for him, to find a good story, and make a snow because they didn't had any actual snow at the time it was really hard. 

I love it. The facts I love: Chase with the Snowmobile, shooting with blanks on Carmine Lorenzo, fights on an airplane, double cross, John's jokes... The General Esperanza on airplane from Val Verde the same country was named in Schwarzenegger's movie Commando, John's shooting with snowmobile, than John's fight by the church. Movie to me is really awesome. I enjoy watching Die Hard 2. 10/10 Grade: Bad-Ass Seal Of Approval It is my second favorite Die Hard film in the series.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":348439,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Thriller"],"datePublished":"1990-07-03","keywords":"john mcclane character,opening action scene,bravery,radar,detective","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Die Hard 2: Die Harder","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2417468441","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmE2MTI4Y2QtNjA0OC00ZTFiLWFjNjUtNzM0YzgwM2VlNDAzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmE2MTI4Y2QtNjA0OC00ZTFiLWFjNjUtNzM0YzgwM2VlNDAzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer 2 for Die Hard: Die Harder","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000246/","name":"Bruce Willis","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0040472/","name":"William Atherton","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000889/","name":"Bonnie Bedelia"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001317/","name":"Renny Harlin"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0119038/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019968/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0211823/","name":"Steven E. de Souza","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0724514/","name":"Doug Richardson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0905709/","name":"Walter Wager"],"duration":"PT2H4M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Clash of the Titans
Kampf der Titanen
programme.desc: Clash of the Titans: Directed by Louis Leterrier. With Sam Worthington, Liam Neeson, Ralph Fiennes, Jason Flemyng. Perseus, a demigod and the son of Zeus, battles the minions of Hades and the Underworld in order to stop them from conquering Olympus and Earth." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0800320/","name":"Clash of the Titans","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYxNjg4MzU5OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTA3NTUwMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Perseus, a demigod and the son of Zeus, battles the minions of Hades and the Underworld in order to stop them from conquering Olympus and Earth.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0800320/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"scott-tomasso"},"dateCreated":"2010-04-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Oh how the mighty titans have fallen","reviewBody":"I, being a huge fan of the original, was probably more excited to see this movie than anyone. And in 3-D no less. So...I walk into the theater with my 3-D glasses on my head, holding my $5 popcorn and get ready to watch my favorite childhood movie and...and...and...oh no. Oh no. This is awful. I sat through the movie wondering why I don't care about any of these characters. On top of that, I'm wondering why I spent the extra money to see it in 3-D. The best 3-D effects came during the opening credits. Other than that, I could have thrown the glasses away. Now I know why James Cameron is not a big fan of making films 3-D after the fact. To make a long story short, I was incredibly disappointed. I would not recommend this movie to anyone. Go see the original "Clash of the Titans" if you want to lose yourself in a good movie. After seeing this one all I could think of was "oh how the mighty titans have fallen."","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":276512,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.8},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2010-04-14","keywords":"kraken,greek mythology,hand to hand combat,famous line,myth","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Clash of the Titans: Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2626946073","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjg0MDg4ODUwOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDg4ODYzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjg0MDg4ODUwOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDg4ODYzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Perseus (Worthington) who was born of a god but raised as a man, sets off on an epic mission to combat Hades (Fiennes) before he can seize power from Zeus (Neeson) and unleash hell on earth. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0941777/","name":"Sam Worthington"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000553/","name":"Liam Neeson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000146/","name":"Ralph Fiennes"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0504642/","name":"Louis Leterrier"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0159111/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0172670/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2012438/","name":"Travis Beacham"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0006534/","name":"Phil Hay"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0542062/","name":"Matt Manfredi"}],"duration":"PT1H46M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Unknown
Unknown Identity
programme.desc: Unknown: Directed by Jaume Collet-Serra. With Liam Neeson, Diane Kruger, January Jones, Aidan Quinn. When a man awakens from a coma only to discover that someone has taken on his identity, he teams up with a young woman to prove who he is." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1401152/","name":"Unknown","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODA4NTk3MTQwN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjUwMTMxNA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"When a man awakens from a coma only to discover that someone has taken on his identity, he teams up with a young woman to prove who he is.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1401152/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"BeneCumb"},"dateCreated":"2012-12-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"An elegant thriller, with several unpredictable twists","reviewBody":"This century has seen Liam Neeson in real leading roles, when his character "permeates" the whole movie and is strong and quick-witted. Taken 1 and 2 are best known, Unknown has - for some reason or another - remained in their shadow. In my opinion, the script of the latter is much stronger, has more twists-turns and unpredictable moments - me being a fan and active viewer of crime thrillers could not guess what kind of background could Neeson's character Dr. Martin Harris really have. Sequence of the events is logical and chases are visually enjoyable. The ending in general is predictable, apart from the very last scene.\n\nWell, all the cast is excellent, not only Liam Neeson; Diane Kruger and Bruno Ganz are the supporting actors more time on screen and they are really good. In short, Unknown is really worth watching - especially if you have not read spoilers :)","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":256017,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Mystery","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2011-03-23","keywords":"amnesia,coma,airport,scientist,nurse","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Unknown: International Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1552980505","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTA4NjYwMDYzMF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTE1NTgyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTA4NjYwMDYzMF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTE1NTgyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A man awakens from a coma, only to discover that someone has taken on his identity and that no one, (not even his wife), believes him. With the help of a young woman, he sets out to prove who he is. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000553/","name":"Liam Neeson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1208167/","name":"Diane Kruger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005064/","name":"January Jones"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1429471/","name":"Jaume Collet-Serra"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050870/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0106949/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0028557/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0124700/","name":"Oliver Butcher"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0180508/","name":"Stephen Cornwell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0885857/","name":"Didier Van Cauwelaert"}],"duration":"PT1H53M"}</script><metacontent="

","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000553/","name":"Liam Neeson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1208167/","name":"Diane Kruger","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005064/","name":"January Jones"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1429471/","name":"Jaume Collet-Serra"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050870/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0106949/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0028557/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0124700/","name":"Oliver Butcher","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0180508/","name":"Stephen Cornwell","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0885857/","name":"Didier Van Cauwelaert"],"duration":"PT1H53M"</script><metacontent="

https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODA4NTk3MTQwN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjUwMTMxNA@@._V1_QL75_UY281_CR0,0,190,281_.jpg

programme.title: Xin shao lin si
Shaolin
programme.desc:
Xin shao lin si: Directed by Benny Chan. With Shaoqun Yu, Chen Zhiui, Xing Yu, Jing Wu. After ambushing and killing his rival, losing everything in the process, dispirited warlord Hou Jie turns to a Shaolin monastery seeking salvation." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1533749/","name":"Xin shao lin si","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDc3MWUwNjgtMjg1My00NzljLWFmMDMtNGRhNzJmNzk4MDllXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjQwMjk0NjI@._V1_.jpg","description":"After ambushing and killing his rival, losing everything in the process, dispirited warlord Hou Jie turns to a Shaolin monastery seeking salvation.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1533749/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"samuelding85"},"dateCreated":"2011-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Shaolin Temple revisited","reviewBody":"In 1982, The Shaolin Temple puts Jet Li into the spotlight as a young man highly skilled in martial arts, which path-ed his acting career into the fame he has today.

Around 29 years later, director Benny Chan comes with a new adaptation of the classic, which shares a similar story with a new cast. Here, we have Andy Lau, Li's co-star in The Warlords (2007) taking the leading role of Hou Chieh, a ruthless warlord who crosses path with Shaolin Temple and sees transformation of himself from a ruthless warlord to a monk with compassion. Together with Nicholas Tse and Jackie Chan in a special appearance, Shaolin marks the first Chinese blockbuster to hit the screens of Asia in 2011.

The story is set in China after the fall of Qing Dynasty with various warlords fighting over the territories. Hou Chieh, a ruthless warlord who bear grudges with Shaolin Temple and sets to get rid of the people around him for his own benefits, was betrayed by his right-hand man, Tsao Man (Tse). It not only leads to the death of his daughter, but also makes his wife (Fan Bing Bing) decided to leave him for good. After being taken refuge by the cook (Chan), the cook enlightens him and Hou decided to become a monk in Shaolin, leaving down the past behind him and start a new life. Though disciples in Shaolin bears grudges with Hou in the past, they accepted Hou. Eventually, we will see how Hou and the disciples defend Shaolin from the invasion of Tsao's army and the Western powers.

The plot sounds no novelty in it, where we can see how the protagonist repents from his sin to the mistake made in the past, to how they will defend in what they believe in. Here, we have seen how the Buddhist teachings have been integrated into the plot. In relating to the Buddhist teaching on the term 'you reap what you sow' with cause and effect, Hou saw the fall of his power and death of loved ones by betrayal, which he gets it from his belief of the dog eat dog world.

Another perspective of Buddhism that can be seen in Shaolin is 'evil begins with the greed and obsession for power'. This is shown by the portrayal of the sufferings from the civilians during the civil war, with warlords fighting for power and wealth. The perspective has become the main theme of the movie, where not only we have seen how Tsao wanted to control the territory, but also the Western powers who aims to take over China using gun power. This has somehow reflect on what has happened in today's society, on how stronger bodies are getting rid the culture, values and history using destructive powers.

Lau's role of Hou Chieh is different from Li's leading role in Shaolin Temple, in terms of characters and the incidents they have been through. Both shared similarities in their fate and enlightenment, to how they find a way to save the majority of the people around them. Chan's cameo appearances as the cook provides some comic relief for the audience after having a long intense and pressure from Tse's evil character. The comic relief did not last very long, since the fate of Shaolin Temple is the main concern of the film.

Overall, Shaolin makes a very good start for Hong Kong's film industry in the beginning of 2011, where it not only shows how Hong Kong film industry are making a turn from various disappointments in 2010, but also pins hope for better productions in the coming months.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":19110,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Drama"],"datePublished":"2011-01-27","keywords":"china,shaolin,1920s,warlord,shaolin master","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1389272089","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjA5NzQwMDAyN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTMyMzYxNg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjA5NzQwMDAyN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTMyMzYxNg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The monks of the Shaolin Temple take in a young warlord whose family was wiped out in an act of betrayal. As he embraces the monk's lifestyle and practices, he and his protectors must face off against the ruthless General Hou. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3195061/","name":"Shaoqun Yu"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5507552/","name":"Chen Zhiui"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1789084/","name":"Xing Yu"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0150802/","name":"Benny Chan"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0233538/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0049799/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0099734/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0950701/","name":"Alan Yuen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2031176/","name":"Chi Kwong Cheung"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4567251/","name":"Quiyu Wang"}],"duration":"PT2H11M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The New Mutants
The New Mutants
programme.desc:
The New Mutants: Directed by Josh Boone. With Maisie Williams, Anya Taylor-Joy, Charlie Heaton, Alice Braga. Five young mutants, just discovering their abilities while held in a secret facility against their will, fight to escape their past sins and save themselves." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4682266/","name":"The New Mutants","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDQ2NTdmNDgtMGIwMS00ODE2LTk5M2EtZGZhYzc4MWRlNTU3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTc4MjczMTM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Five young mutants, just discovering their abilities while held in a secret facility against their will, fight to escape their past sins and save themselves.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4682266/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"user-46-247014"},"dateCreated":"2021-01-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"Bad Writing","reviewBody":"No amount of acting and effects can make up for terrible writing. Lets just say they set up certain things in the movie and then never use them. You're like, oh the beginning of the movie said this, but don't expect anything to happen because... bad writing.

It really peaks near the beginning, then really drags on. Theres a fight scene near the end that is endless, unbelievable, really repetitive. The climax is anticlimactic so....

There was potential for a good movie, and the actors did fine, but the characters didn't act like real people. It was so obvious what was going on but they dragged on every single story element and repeated it. I feel bad for these actors; Truly a waste of money and talent.

Part of the reason it was so bad is because it has an intellectual level of Spy Kids, super predictable and stereotypical moments but placed and set up so poorly that they have no emotional depth. It checks all the boxes except being interesting and having a good plot... you know... like missing the whole point of movies.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":67203,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.3},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Horror","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2020-08-28","keywords":"mutant,based on comic book,marvel comics,x men,superheroine","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Comic-Con Teaser","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1041219097","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmIyNDQxZDgtNTY0NS00ZDcxLTkwNDgtYjQ1ZGI0NGU2ODcxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXNuZXNodQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmIyNDQxZDgtNTY0NS00ZDcxLTkwNDgtYjQ1ZGI0NGU2ODcxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXNuZXNodQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Twentieth Century Studios in association with Marvel Entertainment presents The New Mutants, an original horror thriller set in an isolated hospital where a group of young mutants is being held for psychiatric monitoring. When strange occurrences begin to take place, both their new mutant abilities and their friendships will be tested as they battle to try and make it out alive. Directed by Josh Boone (The Fault in our Stars) and written by Josh Boone & Knate Lee, The New Mutants stars: Maisie Williams (Game of Thrones); Anya Taylor-Joy (Glass); Charlie Heaton (Stranger Things); Alice Braga (Predators); Blu Hunt (The Originals); and Henry Zaga (13 Reasons Why). The film is produced by Simon Kinberg, p.g.a., Karen Rosenfelt and Lauren Shuler Donner with Stan Lee and Michele Imperato Stabile serving as executive producers."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3586035/","name":"Maisie Williams"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5896355/","name":"Anya Taylor-Joy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6390427/","name":"Charlie Heaton"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1837748/","name":"Josh Boone"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0781821/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0566686/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047120/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1837748/","name":"Josh Boone"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1029878/","name":"Knate Lee"}],"duration":"PT1H34M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc:
2012: Directed by Roland Emmerich. With John Cusack, Amanda Peet, Chiwetel Ejiofor, Thandiwe Newton. A frustrated writer struggles to keep his family alive when a series of global catastrophes threatens to annihilate mankind." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1190080/","name":"2012","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY0MjEyODQzMF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTczMjQ4Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A frustrated writer struggles to keep his family alive when a series of global catastrophes threatens to annihilate mankind.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1190080/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"cpbadgeman"},"dateCreated":"2009-11-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great campy fun","reviewBody":"It was pretty much inevitable that someone would make a movie based on all the 2012 hoopla. Nor is it surprising when that someone is disaster maven Roland Emmerich. His latest effort adheres closely to the formula established by his earlier films "Independence Day" and "The Day After Tomorrow"- in other words we get to watch a typically flawed-but-lovable American family (headed by John Cusack and Amanda Peet), along with a range of supporting characters, attempt to survive the end of the world.

That's all there is to the basic plot. The real stars of the film are the truly spectacular special effects. Emmerich really pulls out all the stops and creates some truly awesome set-pieces of destruction. In order to ensure that the main characters have endless perilous situations to escape from, we get to see a bunch of natural and man-made wonders get totaled by Mama Nature. Highlights include Los Angeles falling into the sea, Las Vegas being swallowed by the desert, and the Himalayas being submerged by tidal waves.

Improbable? Definitely. Ridiculous? You bet. But none of that matters since "2012" is exactly the film it was intended to be- a great big popcorn movie that offers big laughs, big thrills, and a lot of good old fashioned fun.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":364535,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.8},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2009-11-11","keywords":"apocalypse,earthquake,end of the world,elizabeth i character,juvenile bedwetting","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"2012: Final Theatrical Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3444113945","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTk0NDQ4MjE5OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODgzMDczMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTk0NDQ4MjE5OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODgzMDczMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"An academic researcher leads a group of people in a fight to counteract the apocalyptic events that were predicted by the ancient Mayan calendar. IMDb data; ttnr: 1190080, Title: 2012, --- Description: 2012: Directed by Roland Emmerich. With John Cusack, Amanda Peet, Chiwetel Ejiofor, Thandiwe Newton. A frustrated writer struggles to keep his family alive when a series of global catastrophes threatens to annihilate mankind." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1190080/","name":"2012","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY0MjEyODQzMF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTczMjQ4Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A frustrated writer struggles to keep his family alive when a series of global catastrophes threatens to annihilate mankind.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1190080/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"cpbadgeman","dateCreated":"2009-11-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great campy fun","reviewBody":"It was pretty much inevitable that someone would make a movie based on all the 2012 hoopla. Nor is it surprising when that someone is disaster maven Roland Emmerich. His latest effort adheres closely to the formula established by his earlier films "Independence Day" and "The Day After Tomorrow"- in other words we get to watch a typically flawed-but-lovable American family (headed by John Cusack and Amanda Peet), along with a range of supporting characters, attempt to survive the end of the world.

That's all there is to the basic plot. The real stars of the film are the truly spectacular special effects. Emmerich really pulls out all the stops and creates some truly awesome set-pieces of destruction. In order to ensure that the main characters have endless perilous situations to escape from, we get to see a bunch of natural and man-made wonders get totaled by Mama Nature. Highlights include Los Angeles falling into the sea, Las Vegas being swallowed by the desert, and the Himalayas being submerged by tidal waves.

Improbable? Definitely. Ridiculous? You bet. But none of that matters since "2012" is exactly the film it was intended to be- a great big popcorn movie that offers big laughs, big thrills, and a lot of good old fashioned fun.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":364535,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.8,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2009-11-11","keywords":"apocalypse,earthquake,end of the world,elizabeth i character,juvenile bedwetting","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"2012: Final Theatrical Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3444113945","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTk0NDQ4MjE5OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODgzMDczMzE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTk0NDQ4MjE5OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODgzMDczMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"An academic researcher leads a group of people in a fight to counteract the apocalyptic events that were predicted by the ancient Mayan calendar. programme.title: Olympus Has Fallen
Olympus Has Fallen – Die Welt in Gefahr
programme.desc:
Olympus Has Fallen: Directed by Antoine Fuqua. With Gerard Butler, Aaron Eckhart, Finley Jacobsen, Dylan McDermott. Secret Service agent Mike Banning finds himself trapped inside the White House in the wake of a terrorist attack and works with national security to rescue the President from his kidnappers." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2302755/","name":"Olympus Has Fallen","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTU0NmY4MWYtNzRlMS00MDkxLWJkODYtOTM3NGI2ZDc1NTJhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjU0OTQ0OTY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Secret Service agent Mike Banning finds himself trapped inside the White House in the wake of a terrorist attack and works with national security to rescue the President from his kidnappers.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2302755/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"AvidClimber"},"dateCreated":"2013-04-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Olympus Has Fallen — America is under attack, to hell with logic","reviewBody":"Olympus Has Fallen is yet an other US president oriented flick. A ton of action and special effects with almost as many logical flaws.

The acting is good, particularly Morgan Freeman (to a lesser extent: Gerard Butler and Aaron Eckhart) and there's no denying the roller coaster ride, but it has many shortcomings. Aside from the usual suspension of disbelief, logic fails at almost every turn. Then there's the poor dialogs, the easy retorts, the one dimensional underdeveloped characters, the incredible body count, and the overly flag-centric pride.

It's action based entertainment for sure, but not much else.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":266381,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2013-03-22","keywords":"politics,political thriller,u.s. president,political assassination,white house","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Exclusive Debut","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3461588761","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY2NDc5NzgyN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODc0MzQzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY2NDc5NzgyN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODc0MzQzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Disgraced former Presidential guard Mike Banning finds himself trapped inside the White House in the wake of a terrorist attack; using his inside knowledge, Banning works with national security to rescue the President from his kidnappers."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0124930/","name":"Gerard Butler"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001173/","name":"Aaron Eckhart"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000151/","name":"Morgan Freeman"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0298807/","name":"Antoine Fuqua"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002572/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002572/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0332840/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4950667/","name":"Creighton Rothenberger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4951717/","name":"Katrin Benedikt"}],"duration":"PT1H59M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: xXx
xXx – Triple X
programme.desc: xXx: Directed by Rob Cohen. With Vin Diesel, Asia Argento, Marton Csokas, Samuel L. Jackson. An extreme sports athlete, Xander Cage, is recruited by the government on a special mission." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0295701/","name":"xXx","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzZjZmM1ZDctNDhlZi00Mzk1LWFjNWItYzIxNGY2OWYzYjJmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjQ2MjQ5NzM@._V1_.jpg","description":"An extreme sports athlete, Xander Cage, is recruited by the government on a special mission.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0295701/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jmuntmootcourt"},"dateCreated":"2005-03-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not exactly smart entertainment, but fun.","reviewBody":"Look, I'm not going to pretend that this is some sort of masterpiece. Though it is basically another "generic action flick", the twists that they add to it make it worth watching. The way they incorporate their "recruitment program" into the movie is fun and original, and though Vin Diesel doesn't really "act" in it, it's a lot of fun to watch. It has a few suspenseful plot elements, and the way they incorporate his status as an extreme sports star (not a spoiler, it's in the previews) into the way he conducts himself as a secret agent makes it more believable. Ever think about some of the stunts that go on in an action movie and wonder, "Okay, exactly WHY would this particular person know how to do that?", because it seems completely unlikely that there would be some sort of training program for the stunt they just pulled off? This movie doesn't have that, because whether he's on a motorcycle, skis, or whatever, you can believe that an extreme sports star would be able to pull off what he's doing. Though the plot is as unrealistic as most movies of this genre, the stunts are a lot more believable than you'll find in most.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":176687,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2002-09-11","keywords":"time bomb,kidnapping,tattoo on torso,adventure hero,physical skill","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"xXx","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi451084569","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYxNjc0OGItNWY2ZS00ZmRjLTlhOTEtNmI1MTFjZDk3ZTY2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYxNjc0OGItNWY2ZS00ZmRjLTlhOTEtNmI1MTFjZDk3ZTY2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Columbia Pictures"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004874/","name":"Vin Diesel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000782/","name":"Asia Argento"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0190744/","name":"Marton Csokas"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0003418/","name":"Rob Cohen"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0003580/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011134/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0929186/","name":"Rich Wilkes"}],"duration":"PT2H4M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Law Abiding Citizen
Gesetz der Rache
programme.desc:
Law Abiding Citizen: Directed by F. Gary Gray. With Jamie Foxx, Gerard Butler, Colm Meaney, Bruce McGill. A frustrated man decides to take justice into his own hands after a plea bargain sets one of his family's killers free." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1197624/","name":"Law Abiding Citizen","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTQ1NmZlNDktZTg0NS00ZjNhLTk5M2QtNzExNjUzY2MwMjliXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODE5NzE3OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A frustrated man decides to take justice into his own hands after a plea bargain sets one of his family's killers free.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1197624/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"adam_952"},"dateCreated":"2010-01-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"One Protagonist, One Antagonist...","reviewBody":"I am just not sure which is which.

I am trying to avoid spoilers here, because it is a definite film you must check out because it is a great new take on the prison based thriller genre, which provides 90 odd minutes of great entertainment with lots of twists and turns to keep the story fresh.

My main criticism is that the story seems to twist and turn so much it gets itself into a nasty tangle. The base of any thriller for an audience, is to want the protagonist to prosper at the downfall of the antagonist, but at the end, i was unsure which of one of the two mains, Nick Rice (foxx) or Clyde Shelton (butler) i should be 'cheering' for.

Each Character has their fair amount of being the good guy, but both were more of the bad guy, a very confusing aspect to a thriller.

Never-the-less, there are some brilliant performances and a very entertaining fresh story kept me glued to the screen for the entirety of the movie.

****/5","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":283009,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.4},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2009-10-16","keywords":"justice,terrorism,rape and revenge,deal,investigation","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Law Abiding Citizen: "Don't Even Twitch"","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1598816793","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU2MDQ2MTEzNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzk2ODA5Mg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU2MDQ2MTEzNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzk2ODA5Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A clip from the movie Law Abiding Citizen."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0124930/","name":"Gerard Butler"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004937/","name":"Jamie Foxx"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004753/","name":"Leslie Bibb"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0336620/","name":"F. A frustrated man decides to take justice into his own hands after a plea bargain sets one of his family's killers free." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1197624/","name":"Law Abiding Citizen","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTQ1NmZlNDktZTg0NS00ZjNhLTk5M2QtNzExNjUzY2MwMjliXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODE5NzE3OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A frustrated man decides to take justice into his own hands after a plea bargain sets one of his family's killers free.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1197624/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"adam_952","dateCreated":"2010-01-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"One Protagonist, One Antagonist...","reviewBody":"I am just not sure which is which.

I am trying to avoid spoilers here, because it is a definite film you must check out because it is a great new take on the prison based thriller genre, which provides 90 odd minutes of great entertainment with lots of twists and turns to keep the story fresh.

My main criticism is that the story seems to twist and turn so much it gets itself into a nasty tangle. The base of any thriller for an audience, is to want the protagonist to prosper at the downfall of the antagonist, but at the end, i was unsure which of one of the two mains, Nick Rice (foxx) or Clyde Shelton (butler) i should be 'cheering' for.

Each Character has their fair amount of being the good guy, but both were more of the bad guy, a very confusing aspect to a thriller.

Never-the-less, there are some brilliant performances and a very entertaining fresh story kept me glued to the screen for the entirety of the movie.

The female lead Madison was great. Her acting was great, the things she did in the movie were smart and believable so her character was written well. The actor who played pierce however was weak. Tulls portrayed a believable dirty cop. Bruce Willis man this is hard to write bc I am a true fan, but he slurred his words and appeared drunk in most of his scenes. Unfortunately this movie is only 5/10 bc it has a weak storyline (dirty cops shoot good cops with their police gun) so the bad guys were a bit too dumb. They should have added 10 more mins to the film to give it more background/depth and it could have been a great movie. It's still worth watching. I was entertained throughout and actually watched the whole thing without getting distracted. programme.desc:
2012: Directed by Roland Emmerich. With John Cusack, Amanda Peet, Chiwetel Ejiofor, Thandiwe Newton. A frustrated writer struggles to keep his family alive when a series of global catastrophes threatens to annihilate mankind." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1190080/","name":"2012","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY0MjEyODQzMF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTczMjQ4Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A frustrated writer struggles to keep his family alive when a series of global catastrophes threatens to annihilate mankind.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1190080/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"cpbadgeman"},"dateCreated":"2009-11-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great campy fun","reviewBody":"It was pretty much inevitable that someone would make a movie based on all the 2012 hoopla. Nor is it surprising when that someone is disaster maven Roland Emmerich. His latest effort adheres closely to the formula established by his earlier films "Independence Day" and "The Day After Tomorrow"- in other words we get to watch a typically flawed-but-lovable American family (headed by John Cusack and Amanda Peet), along with a range of supporting characters, attempt to survive the end of the world.

That's all there is to the basic plot. The real stars of the film are the truly spectacular special effects. Emmerich really pulls out all the stops and creates some truly awesome set-pieces of destruction. In order to ensure that the main characters have endless perilous situations to escape from, we get to see a bunch of natural and man-made wonders get totaled by Mama Nature. Highlights include Los Angeles falling into the sea, Las Vegas being swallowed by the desert, and the Himalayas being submerged by tidal waves.

Improbable? Definitely. Ridiculous? You bet. But none of that matters since "2012" is exactly the film it was intended to be- a great big popcorn movie that offers big laughs, big thrills, and a lot of good old fashioned fun.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":364535,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.8},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2009-11-11","keywords":"apocalypse,earthquake,end of the world,elizabeth i character,juvenile bedwetting","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"2012: Final Theatrical Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3444113945","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTk0NDQ4MjE5OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODgzMDczMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTk0NDQ4MjE5OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODgzMDczMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"An academic researcher leads a group of people in a fight to counteract the apocalyptic events that were predicted by the ancient Mayan calendar. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000131/","name":"John Cusack"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0628601/","name":"Thandiwe Newton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0252230/","name":"Chiwetel Ejiofor"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000386/","name":"Roland Emmerich"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050111/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0247168/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000386/","name":"Roland Emmerich"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0460057/","name":"Harald Kloser"}],"duration":"PT2H38M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Straw Dogs
Straw Dogs – Wer Gewalt sät
programme.desc:
Straw Dogs: Directed by Rod Lurie. With James Marsden, Kate Bosworth, Alexander Skarsgård, James Woods. Los Angeles screenwriter David Sumner relocates with his wife to her hometown in the deep South. There, while tensions build between them, a brewing conflict with locals becomes a threat to them both." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0999913/","name":"Straw Dogs","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzQ1MTk5ODIzM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzU1MzgyMjI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Los Angeles screenwriter David Sumner relocates with his wife to her hometown in the deep South. There, while tensions build between them, a brewing conflict with locals becomes a threat to them both.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0999913/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ma-cortes"},"dateCreated":"2013-03-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Inferior but exciting remake about a writer and his wife are threatened by hooligans locals","reviewBody":"Modern remake from Sam Peckinpah's 1971 controversial shocker in which Dustin Hoffman, who starred in , and famously disliked, the original film, gave filmmaker Rod Lurie his blessing . Released i almost 40 years to the day of the original 1971 version, which came out November 3 1971 . It deals with L.A. screen writer David Sumner (James Marsden) relocates with his wife (Kate Bosworth) to her hometown in the deep South. When they return to her ancestral village tensions build between them, a brewing conflict with locals (Rhys Coiro, Billy Lush and led by Alexander Skarsgård as Charlie) becomes a threat to them both. Meanwhile David is working on a story about Stalingrad (the book is early in the movie is 'Stalingrad' by Anthony Beevor). There her former boyfriends become resentful , jealous and desirous of her , as she taunts them with her wealth and nudism and she is viciously attacked . As the marriage is bullied and taken advantage of by the locals (in original rendition were played by Ken Hutchinson, David Warner , Peter Vaughan , Del Henney) hired to do construction. When David finally takes a stand it escalates quickly into a bloody battle as the locals assault his house . David whose pacifism is put to supreme test attempts to protect a dim-witted man (Dominic Purcell) who is suspected of disappearance and molesting a young girl (Willa Holland) , his house is put under siege by the incensed villagers , but David defends the mansion with ferocity .

New but inferior version version about one of the most controversial violence-themed pictures of its day ; dealing with a known plot , as a young American and his wife come to rural little town and face increasingly vicious local harassment. The film, a remake of the controversially violent 1971 movie, is considered fairly faithful to Sam Peckinpah's original, though the location has been moved from Cornwall, England to the U.S. Mississippi Gulf Coast, and the hero's profession has been changed from an intellectual mathematician to screenwriter . The title comes from the Chinese philosopher Lao-tzu, who wrote, "Heaven and earth are not humane, and regard the people as straw dogs, " Straw dogs were used as ceremonial objects for religious sacrifices in ancient China. The picture is as violent as the first version , in fact, because of its graphic portrayal of violence and two brutal rapes, the British Board of Film Censors banned the film from being released on video from 1984 until 2002. The highly charged sequences of carnage in the conclusion make this a controversial movie similarly to original picture .

The motion picture was professionally directed by Rod Lurie though with no originally , resulting to be a simple copy from Peckinpah flick , being equally based on the novel "The Siege of Trencher's Farm" by Gordon Williams , including screenplay by David Goodman and the same Peckinpah. Rod is a talented film critic-turned-director who burst onto the scene in late 2000 with his hotly debated political thriller ¨The contender¨. After writing some scripts , Lurie was already hard at work at his next film, working with his acting hero Robert Redford. The result was the 2001 action/drama ¨The last castle ¨ (2001). It centered on an imprisoned military general, forced to go up against a tyrannical prison warden . He subsequently directed ¨Resurrecting the champ¨ and ¨Nothing but the truth¨, both of them were commercial failures despite some favorable reviews as well as ¨Straw Dogs¨.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":33727,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.8},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2011-09-16","keywords":"rape,sexual humiliation,rape victim,gang rape,panties pulled down","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi174103833","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIyNzU4MDI4Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDI5MzQzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIyNzU4MDI4Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDI5MzQzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"L.A. screenwriter David Sumner relocates with his wife to her hometown in the deep South. There, while tensions build between them, a brewing conflict with locals becomes a threat to them both. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005188/","name":"James Marsden"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0098378/","name":"Kate Bosworth"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002907/","name":"Alexander Skarsgård"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0527109/","name":"Rod Lurie"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010568/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0089304/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0527109/","name":"Rod Lurie"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0329051/","name":"David Zelag Goodman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001603/","name":"Sam Peckinpah"}],"duration":"PT1H50M"}</script><metacontent="

There, while tensions build between them, a brewing conflict with locals becomes a threat to them both." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0999913/","name":"Straw Dogs","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzQ1MTk5ODIzM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzU1MzgyMjI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Los Angeles screenwriter David Sumner relocates with his wife to her hometown in the deep South. There, while tensions build between them, a brewing conflict with locals becomes a threat to them both.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0999913/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"ma-cortes","dateCreated":"2013-03-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Inferior but exciting remake about a writer and his wife are threatened by hooligans locals","reviewBody":"Modern remake from Sam Peckinpah's 1971 controversial shocker in which Dustin Hoffman, who starred in , and famously disliked, the original film, gave filmmaker Rod Lurie his blessing . Released i almost 40 years to the day of the original 1971 version, which came out November 3 1971 . It deals with L.A. screen writer David Sumner (James Marsden) relocates with his wife (Kate Bosworth) to her hometown in the deep South. When they return to her ancestral village tensions build between them, a brewing conflict with locals (Rhys Coiro, Billy Lush and led by Alexander Skarsgård as Charlie) becomes a threat to them both. Meanwhile David is working on a story about Stalingrad (the book is early in the movie is 'Stalingrad' by Anthony Beevor). There her former boyfriends become resentful , jealous and desirous of her , as she taunts them with her wealth and nudism and she is viciously attacked . As the marriage is bullied and taken advantage of by the locals (in original rendition were played by Ken Hutchinson, David Warner , Peter Vaughan , Del Henney) hired to do construction. When David finally takes a stand it escalates quickly into a bloody battle as the locals assault his house . David whose pacifism is put to supreme test attempts to protect a dim-witted man (Dominic Purcell) who is suspected of disappearance and molesting a young girl (Willa Holland) , his house is put under siege by the incensed villagers , but David defends the mansion with ferocity .

New but inferior version version about one of the most controversial violence-themed pictures of its day ; dealing with a known plot , as a young American and his wife come to rural little town and face increasingly vicious local harassment. The film, a remake of the controversially violent 1971 movie, is considered fairly faithful to Sam Peckinpah's original, though the location has been moved from Cornwall, England to the U.S. Mississippi Gulf Coast, and the hero's profession has been changed from an intellectual mathematician to screenwriter . The title comes from the Chinese philosopher Lao-tzu, who wrote, "Heaven and earth are not humane, and regard the people as straw dogs, " Straw dogs were used as ceremonial objects for religious sacrifices in ancient China. The picture is as violent as the first version , in fact, because of its graphic portrayal of violence and two brutal rapes, the British Board of Film Censors banned the film from being released on video from 1984 until 2002. The highly charged sequences of carnage in the conclusion make this a controversial movie similarly to original picture .

The motion picture was professionally directed by Rod Lurie though with no originally , resulting to be a simple copy from Peckinpah flick , being equally based on the novel "The Siege of Trencher's Farm" by Gordon Williams , including screenplay by David Goodman and the same Peckinpah. Rod is a talented film critic-turned-director who burst onto the scene in late 2000 with his hotly debated political thriller ¨The contender¨. After writing some scripts , Lurie was already hard at work at his next film, working with his acting hero Robert Redford. The result was the 2001 action/drama ¨The last castle ¨ (2001). It centered on an imprisoned military general, forced to go up against a tyrannical prison warden . He subsequently directed ¨Resurrecting the champ¨ and ¨Nothing but the truth¨, both of them were commercial failures despite some favorable reviews as well as ¨Straw Dogs¨.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":33727,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.8,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2011-09-16","keywords":"rape,sexual humiliation,rape victim,gang rape,panties pulled down","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi174103833","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIyNzU4MDI4Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDI5MzQzMzE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIyNzU4MDI4Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDI5MzQzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"L.A. screenwriter David Sumner relocates with his wife to her hometown in the deep South.
